parameters.name: AutoPay
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic payment. Valid values:

- **true** (default): Enables automatic payment. Make sure that your account has a sufficient balance.

- **false**: Disables automatic payment. You must manually pay for the order.

parameters.name: BusinessInfo
parameters.description: The business information. This is an additional parameter.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: CouponNo
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use a coupon. Valid values:

- **default** or **null** (default): A coupon is used.

- **youhuiquan\_promotion\_option\_id\_for\_blank**: A coupon is not used.

parameters.name: EffectiveTime
parameters.description:
The effective time of the configuration change. Valid values:

- **Immediately** (default): The change takes effect immediately.

- **MaintainTime**: The change takes effect during the O\&M window of the instance.

parameters.name: FromApp
parameters.description:
The source of the request. Valid values:

- **OpenApi**: The request is from OpenAPI.

- **mongo\_buy**: The request is from the console.

parameters.name: NodeClass
parameters.description: The instance type of the shard or Mongos node. For more information, see [Instance types](~~57141~~).

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the shard or Mongos node in the sharded cluster instance. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~62010~~) operation to query the node ID.

> If you set this parameter to the ID of a shard node, you must also specify the **NodeStorage** parameter.

parameters.name: NodeStorage
parameters.description:
The storage space of the shard node. The step size is 10. Unit: GB.

- SSD local disk: **10** to **2000**.

- ESSD PL1 disk: **20** to **16000**.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order type. Valid values:

- **UPGRADE**: upgrades the instance configuration.

- **DOWNGRADE**: downgrades the instance configuration.

parameters.name: ReadonlyReplicas
parameters.description:
The number of read-only nodes in the shard node.

Valid values: **0** to **5**. The value must be an integer.

parameters.name: SwitchTime
parameters.description:
The time when the configuration change takes effect. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

> This parameter is deprecated. Use the EffectiveTime parameter instead.

parameters.name: TargetHiddenZoneId
parameters.description:
The hidden zone to which you want to migrate the instance.

><notice>

This parameter is applicable only to instances that use disks.

></notice>

parameters.name: TargetSecondaryZoneId
parameters.description:
The secondary zone to which you want to migrate the instance.

><notice>

This parameter is applicable only to instances that use disks.

></notice>

parameters.name: TargetVswitchId
parameters.description:
The ID of the vSwitch in the destination zone.

><notice>

This parameter is applicable only to instances that use disks.

></notice>

parameters.name: TargetZoneId
parameters.description:
The primary zone to which you want to migrate the instance.

><notice>

This parameter is applicable only to instances that use disks.

></notice>
